Name: Shing!
About the game: Experience the most exciting and immersive beat-em-up combat system ever â€“ become a kickass ninja and slice some demons in style! Join a band of wisecracking warriors in a bloody adventure through the land of mythical monsters and mysterious machines. FEATURES Play solo or with friends: 4 player local and online co-op Experience immersive and intuitive controls, or use classic 'button mashing' technique: right analog stick controls your weapon giving you instant access to extensive moveset. With the alternative controls, you aim with the right stick, and mash buttons to perform attacks. Enjoy gameplay that never gets old: master the multilayered combat, overcome clever enemies and face epic bosses Experiment with freestyle combat system: mix and match combos, switch characters on the fly, and turn enemy abilities against them Witness the glory of beat-em-up 2.0!
